html:
2.21.20  1:22 am   hey it's the asker who was frustrated with not knowing why a d7 chord on the ukulele sounded bad to me when i was trying to learn it. i just wanted to let you know i just figured out how to play the melody to land of hope and glory by ear on the keyboard. it was trial and error and at the beginning i was kinda down on myself because it sounded wrong at bits and i didn't think i was smart enough to find out why, then i thought of how you told me i CAN rely on my ears to find the good sound, and in twenty or thirty minutes i HAD it. it was such a beautiful moment that i'm still practically shaking. thank you so much, you have no idea how much you've helped me. i really hope you're proud of yourself for how much joy you've unlocked within other people's lives, right here on bill wurtz dot com

      holy smokesignal you are very friendly

2.21.20  1:18 am   Does time exist?

      oh that would explain a lot

2.21.20  1:03 am   in im best friends with my own front door, did you chose a specific book foro your book flipping scene? on "open to page 1 and then skip ahead to page 2"? 

      no, i think the whole point of the '2 week' plan (as opposed to like 13 weeks, which was the absolute best i could do immediately prior) was that there was ABSOLUTELY no time to think about that. Thinking about what you just mentioned is exactly the kind of thing i would normally think about, when not on such a cut throat time table

2.21.20  1:01 am   want to take a road trip?

      yes

2.21.20  12:32 am   whats ya middle name

      porcupine

2.21.20  12:28 am   what was it like getting to the point you realized the way to go was to make shortest content possible that you can control and be happy (?) with and grow from there.

     luscious, victorious, lusciously victorious,

      What other approaches had you tried and for how long?

     being confused for a while

      Was it perfectionism that got you to that solution/approach?

     no

      Something else? timeline much appreciated. 

     i guess it was just desperation to climb that staircase and then finally i realized the damn thing actually is a staircase. and a stair, well, that i can do

2.21.20  12:13 am   what is your view on "things"?

      never heard of it

2.20.20  11:41 pm   Is earth secretly gay

      that is extremely obvious, and therefore not a secret

2.20.20  11:38 pm   Is it 2020?

      oh that would explain a lot

2.20.20  11:33 pm   2.20.20  10:00 am ok prove it

      ever seen commercials

2.20.20  11:22 pm   Have you ever pondered the sheer unlikelihood if your own existence?

      no, but i have pondered the sheer likelyhood of the existence of perhaps every other thing imaginable

2.20.20  11:18 pm   can you just set the countdown timer to 0 for us please

      yes, in fact that's exactly what i'm going to do

2.20.20  10:40 pm   can explosion explode?

      [calculating] yes, it can

2.20.20  10:37 pm   What do I do now?

      you could re-invent the dump truck. it's damn near time that thing got a re-invent

2.20.20  10:24 pm   how do you feel about the Tooth Fairy™?

      i can only begin to imagine how much teeth they have accumulated by now

2.20.20  10:14 pm   Imagine imagining about imagination?

      hm... ok but when do i get to do stuff

2.20.20  10:11 pm   Serious question time!
I've been thinking about getting into music (you're one of the people that inspired me), but I'm having trouble thinking of how i want it to sound. Is there anything that could help me think of how i want it to be?

      hm... you might be putting the wheel before the barrow here

2.20.20  10:00 pm   I've been transcribing you like crazy lately (mt st helens, I can play, and now the road) and must say this is all blowing my mind. I used to suspect that changing keys was the common factor in all the music I really loved and now I am seeing it firsthand. What should I do to make this music more of a part of me?

      be very careful, and try not to think too hard about the actual key changes. trust me, there are many many many ways to 'change keys' that i promise you would not like

2.20.20  9:53 pm   do you consider existence to exist somewhere?

      no way, that seems too outlandish

2.20.20  9:45 pm   Does anyone really know how computers work?

     yes

      I always thought tiny little people did everything but apparently that's not true.

2.20.20  9:26 pm   it's a good thing you make your content because otherwise no one would and then where would we be? 

      you might be stuck making your own content

2.20.20  9:18 pm   are you a feet

      oh that would explain a lot

2.20.20  9:01 pm   When is the Velcro episode 

      when velcro is more accepted in society

2.20.20  9:01 pm   I am bored, sad and thirsty, what should I do 

      see if you can solve the world's water shortage

2.20.20  8:53 pm   How to be brave?

      sign up for a free trial membership with no money in your bank account

2.20.20  8:37 pm   can i punch you?

      you could try

2.20.20  8:29 pm   are  you me

      oh that would explain a lot

2.20.20  8:17 pm   What are your thoughts on "children"

      they are the arch rival of the grown up

2.20.20  8:16 pm   When is time

      soonish

2.20.20  8:06 pm   when are you making another vid?

      immediately before making several more

2.20.20  7:48 pm   My sleep cycle is broke how fix 

      try to prime factor the number 405259 in your head. you won't be able to do it but you will fall asleeep while trying

2.20.20  7:43 pm   What's your idea behind video-documenting so much of your process? I find it really encouraging and enjoyable, but is there another reason you take the time to do it?

      the reason you said, is probably the best reason. another reason is it helps me figure out what the hell i am doing

2.20.20  7:40 pm   my free trial of the not bored has ended how do i exist now

      you can re-invent the cataclysm. it's about damn near time that thing got a re-invent

2.20.20  7:34 pm   do you ever sleep?

      that sounds vaguely familiar

2.20.20  7:32 pm   How do i modulate from a major key to another major key without it sounding bad

      hm... i'm just doing a bit of detective work and i am trying to figure out the reason you want to do this. i have concluded that you have heard it done in other songs and liked it. so my only suggestion is, learn how those songs did it. and don't necessarily do that right away in your songs, but it will probably end up happening soon

2.20.20  7:28 pm   You've made a LOT of videos over the years. Has anybody ever confused you by asking about a video you forgot you'd made?

      all the time

2.20.20  7:24 pm   why do you like umbrellas?

      their unique geometry

2.20.20  7:18 pm   How do I turn my life around?

      put it in the washer dryer, set it to a gentle tumble

2.20.20  7:16 pm   any opinions on upside-down cake? asking for a friend

      it's right side up

2.20.20  7:15 pm   if you were to not be for a day, would you?

      hm, maybe only half the day

2.20.20  7:09 pm   is the "im feeling randy" button randy enough?

      yes

2.20.20  7:02 pm   what's 2+2

      what do you think i am, some kind of super computer

2.20.20  6:51 pm   how do you feel about the sunlight today?

      very good

2.20.20  6:37 pm   How do I life better?

      you are doing very good

2.20.20  5:40 pm   Checkmate?

      no, i still have plenty of moves

2.20.20  4:15 pm   How has the wheel helped us since the wheel-less crisis of 1982?

      that's fake. you are talking about something fake. some falsification has occured

2.20.20  4:00 pm   are you bill wurtz?

      oh that would explain a lot

2.20.20  3:53 pm   how can i save everyone

      have you thought about yelling in the subway while handing out pamphlets

2.20.20  3:39 pm   Is there any purpose to thinking about music in terms of the number system? I like the idea of just letting melody guide the chord progression much more

      numbers or not, make sure you don't lose track of what it sounds like. because that's kind of the point

2.20.20  3:02 pm   i wanna go to school because i'm smart

      ok well hopefully you can be the teacher
